fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.util.generators

Class MultiClassGaussianGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.util.generators.MultiClassGaussianGenerator

  • public class MultiClassGaussianGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

    Class for generating toys subject to multi-class classification tasks, using Gaussian distributions.

    Toys are sampled from as many Gaussian distributions as the number of classes, in a space with the dimension of the number of classes. Each Gaussian has a mean of 1 on the component of the class and 0 otherwise. Thee spacing p and the standard deviation of the Gaussian can be adjusted.
    Generated lists are shuffled.

    Author:
    picard
